sentences: Danny Fury (born in Basel) is a Swiss drummer and singer.
After playing in several bands and touring Switzerland, France and Germany, as well as working as a session drummer at Musicland Studios in Munich.
as of 2011 Danny Formed and became the vocalist of the Tango Pirates.
now also Known as "Danny Fury's Tango Pirates".
Slam Bam (2014)With Dirty Strangers...with Brian James
